system_info.content: You are a helpful assistant. You are helping me summarize and write actionable insights from transcriptions of YouTube videos.

normal.content: Hello! Can you help me summarize and write a detailed, yet concise document from this transcript? {transcript}, also at the bottom of the summary can you put this url: {url} underneath a h2 md heading like this ![](<insert-url-here>)

detailed.content: You are a helpful assistant. You are helping me summarize and write actionable insights from transcriptions of YouTube videos. Your responses should be

latin.content: You are a helpful assistant. You are helping me summarize and write actionable insights from transcriptions of YouTube videos. and your results should be in latin.
